item.title: Checkmate Pattern: Dovetail Mate, Smothered Mate, Morphy's Mate, Swallow's Tail Mate
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: In this article, I would like to share 4 popular checkmate patterns, which are Dovettail Mate, Smothered Mate, Morphy Mate, and Swallow Tail Mate.
